messages.text: FYI team the https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C023RDEC65R/p1762858069607949?thread_ts=1756296647.183979&cid=C023RDEC65R on staging for GoC, this means that right now on staging the first order is no longer being created on checkout, instead it will be created on cut-off. Would be great to validate that everything works as expected on staging for a newly created subscription
messages.raw_text: FYI team the <https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C023RDEC65R/p1762858069607949?thread_ts=1756296647.183979&cid=C023RDEC65R|initial order deprecation was enabled again> on staging for GoC, this means that right now on staging the first order is no longer being created on checkout, instead it will be created on cut-off. Would be great to validate that everything works as expected on staging for a newly created subscription

thread_replies.text:
Hey @U8F7ZDAPM @UFE79GKFC!

Today we found out that initial order deprecation blocks Charge at Checkout for MR and KN.

Plans Squad enabled it again for both brands now.
Blocks it in what way? Are they incompatible?
With disabled initial order Payments doesn't receive required Description field from intfood.
Is that something we can sort out?
Yes, Plans squad will sort it out. For now they enabled initial orders for us

messages.text:
Hello :wave:

We're substituting the Good Chop Support Slack Workflow (that green button we had) to the Slack Commander :robot_face:

From now on, please use `/new_issue` or `/new_question` to submit your support request to our squad and fill up the form. We will get back to you as soon as possible as always. Same as before but with a new, well-known, and more powerful tool.

Thank you! :goodchop_fan:
messages.raw_text:
Hello :wave:

We're substituting the Good Chop Support Slack Workflow (that green button we had) to the Slack Commander :robot_face:

From now on, please use `/new_issue` or `/new_question` to submit your support request to our squad and fill up the form. We will get back to you as soon as possible as always. Same as before but with a new, well-known, and more powerful tool.

Thank you! :goodchop_fan:
